title: As U.S. Strikes Targets In Iraq, A Sense Of Deja Vu
teaser: On Thursday, President Obama became the fourth U.S. president in a row to initiate military strikes in Iraq. NPR's Arun Rath reflects on 23 years of on and off airstrikes in the country.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
